title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.26 - Crematory operator course approvals and denials
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 203.26 - Crematory operator course approvals and denials

State Regulations

Within 30 days after the receipt of the application for
approval of an offering, the Division of Cemeteries shall inform the
organization as to whether the offering has been approved, denied, or whether
additional information is needed to determine the acceptability of the
offering. The division may deny, suspend, or revoke the approval of a
certification course of an organization, if it is determined that they are not
in compliance with the law and rules, or if the offering does not adequately
reflect and present current cremation knowledge as a basis for a level of
cremation practice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
203.26

Renumbered from 204.12

New

York State Register August 7, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 32, eff. 8/7/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
